overview: The action of the series takes place in a more distant Fabel production plant, covering the period from 1957 to 1972. The heroes of the next episodes are the directors of this plant, the captains of our industry. Their activity, not without errors, was presented against a wide background of social and moral changes taking place in the country, in close connection with the production efforts of the plant staff and the mood of the technical staff.
title: Dyrektorzy
